entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable WOW64 support in ANCM #60978
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, json_middleware #60975
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, json #60974
  • Quarantine `Reset_DuringRequestBody_Resets` - timeouts #60973
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Only references the first list correctly - OpenAPI definition #60972
  • Blazor: Better stacktrace for exceptions in rendering logic, including line number in Razor files #60971
  • In Minimal API Content-type of the response is overriden with application/json making it unusable for SSE #60965

Closed

  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #60966
  • Problem Details camel case RFC 7807 "compliant casing" #59396
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-alpha.1.25057.15] CleanArchitecture1 get error: System.TypeLoadException: Method 'get_Description' in type 'FastEndpoints.ProducesResponseTypeMetadata' from assembly FastEndpoints does not have an implementation. #59804
  • Quarantine RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm #60873
    .NET 10 Planning
  • EventCallback HasDelegate=false in InteractiveServer child component from an SSR parent #60954
  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url #60944
  • Blazor work doesn't seem to take place within an activity #60788
  • I am having trouble migrating Blazor WASM SPA project to component rendering ( mix between wasm and server render) #60748

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix OpenAPI XML code gen #60977
    area-mvc
  • Use trim-safe ValidationContext constructor and update RuntimeParameterInfoResolver #60976
    area-minimal
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Use Kind Artifact metadata and minor improvements to Signing/Publishing.props #60967
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Only build the target platform in native projs for the VMR #60910
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add default implementation to OpenAPI's new Description property to prevent a breaking change #60937
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview3
  • Add doc owners column to area owners table #60818
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Rename `DisableMatchAllIgnoresLeftUriPart` to `EnableMatchAllForQueryStringAndFragmentSwitchKey` #60969
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25167.4 #60968
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix `RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm` #60920
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, blog-candidate
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • pin gha #60948
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve flaky tests, move tests blockade. #60930
    test-failure, area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning
